examples.translation: 他买游艇只是为了显示身分--其实他根本不喜欢玩游艇.
examples.first: He only bought the yacht as a status

examples.translation: 红润的面颊是健康的象征.

n: an arbitrary sign (written or printed) that has acquired a conventional significance
something visible that by association or convention represents something else that is invisible
符号, 标志, 象征
